keyMoments.description: Miss All Sunday mysteriously infiltrates the Going Merry without being detected, appearing on the ship to confront the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the crew's home and sanctuary can be breached, emphasizing the danger posed by skilled enemies.

keyMoments.description: Luffy destroys the Eternal Pose on the deck of the Going Merry, making his defining declaration about the crew's independence.
keyMoments.significance: The Going Merry serves as the setting for one of Luffy's most iconic character moments, reinforcing the ship as a symbol of the crew's freedom.

keyMoments.description: The Going Merry departs Whisky Peak with Vivi and Karoo aboard, setting course for Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: The ship carries the crew and their new companions into the next stage of their journey through the Grand Line.
